about_the_game:
Fight tons of robots, upgrade your abilities and explore an abandoned artificial planet with your jetpack in this non-linear shoot'em up adventure!



Set in the distant future, play as Gabriela Xanchez, an historian working for the galactic government, sent to investigate the remains of an old industrial planet and retrieve a misterious artifact: the last paper book in existance.



  • Fast paced combat with tons of different enemies: The security systems are no longer working properly and will shoot any intruder on sight, including you!
  • A non-linear world to explore from the start: No powerups or keys required to reach any area, only your skills against an army of heavily armed robots.
  • Different environments with specific obstacles and challenges: Make sure to explore and find upgrades to your armor and missile launcher.
  • Collect a modest but strong selection of modifiers: Equip them to improve your chances in combat!
  • Meet the peculiar characters that still inhabit the planet: Complete sidequests and help them leave the planet with you to avoid its impending destruction.

Set in the distant future, play as Gabriela Xanchez, an historian working for the galactic government, sent to investigate the remains of an old industrial planet and retrieve a misterious artifact: the last paper book in existance.

  • A non-linear world to explore from the start: No powerups or keys required to reach any area, only your skills against an army of heavily armed robots.
  • Different environments with specific obstacles and challenges: Make sure to explore and find upgrades to your armor and missile launcher.
  • Collect a modest but strong selection of modifiers: Equip them to improve your chances in combat!

name: The Last Librarian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Fight tons of robots, upgrade your abilities and explore an abandoned artificial planet with your jetpack in this non-linear shoot'em up adventure! Play as Gabriela Xanchez, a galactic government agent sent to investigate a dying world and find the last paper book in the galaxy.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
